name: Minijam-Revival-001:ColorBroken
description:
As a way to practice game development and get better, I thought of simulating mini-gamejam, starting with first one which is here:-

https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam

Controls:-

Movement: Arrow keys
Jump: Z key or Space.

Credits:-

  • Mikado: Developer
  • EienNoBeginner: BGM.
  • SFBDim:ChipTone to make sounds.
  • Kenny: Art (1 bit platformer pack)
  • Godot: Merge scene is  OP, please nerf said by all other game engines.
